California, sta telefonando e cade sui binari: salvato dal vigilante all'ultimo secondo

05 Nov 2019




John O'Connor, impiegato della stazione a Oakland in California, ha salvato un passeggero caduto sui binari pochi istanti prima che arrivasse un treno, probabilmente perch√© era distratto dal cellulare. O'Connor ha reagito velocemente e ha tirato l'uomo sulla piattaforma. text:
California is calling and falling on the tracks: saved by the vigilante at the last second

05 Nov 2019




John O'Connor, a station employee in Oakland, California, rescued a passenger who had fallen on the rails a few moments before a train arrived, probably because he was distracted by his cell phone. O'Connor reacted quickly and pulled the man onto the platform. After the incident, the vigilante said: "I want to think that anyone else would have done the same thing". (Video by Sfbart / Tony Badilla / Twitter)
